review.description:
4 stars in the world of Takeout Chinese
2 stars in the world of...food. 

OK..I was totally grossed out by Park Avenue Chinese Restaurant, and then my coworker recommended this place. I was hungry & broke, and craving an eggroll. 

1 General Tso's Combination Platter, STAT. 

This shit lasted me 3 days. 3 DAYS!!!!! SO. MUCH. FOOD. It cost me 2.16666666....cents per day! And it's infinitely better than Kum Kau or Park Avenue! Granted, I felt absolutely disgusting after eating this, but how else are you supposed to feel after eating this "chinese" grub? 

If you are looking for cheap eats in the area, this is definitely one of the better spots...if you don't feel like Park Avenue Luncheonette.
review.author: Briana M.

review.description: Not the best, but not the worst. Gets the job done if you want Chinese and there's nothing else around. CASH ONLY.  They should have a sign posted on the window saying that, but they don't. Overall 3/5, but I'd probably lean more towards 2.5.
review.author: Cyn C.
